languages.text: "Ты прямо ожила в этой мясорубке. Ты точно не одна из друкари?"
"This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"
languages.original_text: "Ты прямо ожила в этой мясорубке. Ты точно не одна из друкари?"

traits.locale_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"
"This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"
"This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"
"This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"
"This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"

languages.text: "Dieses Blutvergießen hat Euch nachgerade lebendig werden lassen. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr kein Drukhari seid?"
languages.original_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Blutvergießen hat Euch nachgerade lebendig werden lassen. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr kein Drukhari seid?"

languages.text: « Ce carnage vous a donné un sacré coup de fouet, dites-moi. Vous êtes sûre que vous n'êtes pas une Drukhari ? »
languages.original_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"

traits.locale_text: « Ce carnage vous a donné un sacré coup de fouet, dites-moi. Vous êtes sûre que vous n'êtes pas une Drukhari ? »

languages.text: «La carnicería la tiene animada. ¿Seguro que no es una de los Drukhari?».
languages.original_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"

traits.locale_text: «La carnicería la tiene animada. ¿Seguro que no es una de los Drukhari?».

languages.text: 「この大虐殺で、あなたは本当に元気が出たのね。本当にデュカーリの仲間じゃないの？」
languages.original_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"

traits.locale_text: 「この大虐殺で、あなたは本当に元気が出たのね。本当にデュカーリの仲間じゃないの？」

languages.text: “看得出来，这场大屠杀真的是让你相当兴奋。你确定你真的不是黑暗灵族？”
languages.original_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，这场大屠杀真的是让你相当兴奋。你确定你真的不是黑暗灵族？”

languages.original_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"

languages.text: "Bu katliam, neşeni gerçekten yerine getirdi. Drukhari olmadığına emin misin?"
languages.original_text: "This carnage has really livened you up. Are you sure you're not one of the Drukhari?"
